refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The GnomeVFSSocket function family unifies network I/O through functions similar to the standard POSIX read/write functions. The main difference is that all operations are cancellable through the standard GnomeVFS cancellation mechanism and you can specify a maximum amount of time an operation may take through gnome_vfs_socket_set_timeout.

refsect2.title: GnomeVFSSocketReadFunc ()
refsect2.programlisting: GnomeVFSResult (*GnomeVFSSocketReadFunc) (gpointer connection, gpointer buffer, GnomeVFSFileSize bytes, GnomeVFSFileSize *bytes_read, GnomeVFSCancellation *cancellation);

refsect2.title: GnomeVFSSocketWriteFunc ()
refsect2.programlisting: GnomeVFSResult (*GnomeVFSSocketWriteFunc) (gpointer connection, gconstpointer buffer, GnomeVFSFileSize bytes, GnomeVFSFileSize *bytes_written, GnomeVFSCancellation *cancellation);

refsect2.title: struct GnomeVFSSocketImpl
gnome_vfs_socket_new ()
refsect2.para: Creates a new GnomeVFS Socket using the specific implementation impl.

listitem.simpara: an implementation of a socket, e.g. GnomeVFSSSL
pointer to a connection object used by impl to track state (the exact nature of connection varies from implementation to implementation)
a newly created socket

refsect2.title: gnome_vfs_socket_write ()
refsect2.programlisting: GnomeVFSResult gnome_vfs_socket_write (GnomeVFSSocket *socket, gconstpointer buffer, int bytes, GnomeVFSFileSize *bytes_written, GnomeVFSCancellation *cancellation);
refsect2.para: Write bytes bytes of data from buffer to socket.

listitem.simpara: socket to write data to
data to write to the socket
number of bytes from buffer to write to socket
pointer to a GnomeVFSFileSize, will contain the number of bytes actually written to the socket on return.
optional cancellation object
GnomeVFSResult indicating the success of the operation

refsect2.title: gnome_vfs_socket_close ()
refsect2.para: Close socket, freeing any resources it may be using.

listitem.simpara: the socket to be closed
optional cancellation object
GnomeVFSResult indicating the success of the operation

refsect2.title: gnome_vfs_socket_read ()
refsect2.programlisting: GnomeVFSResult gnome_vfs_socket_read (GnomeVFSSocket *socket, gpointer buffer, GnomeVFSFileSize bytes, GnomeVFSFileSize *bytes_read, GnomeVFSCancellation *cancellation);
refsect2.para: Read bytes bytes of data from the socket into buffer.

listitem.simpara: socket to read data from
allocated buffer of at least bytes bytes to be read into
number of bytes to read from socket into buffer
pointer to a GnomeVFSFileSize, will contain the number of bytes actually read from the socket on return.
optional cancellation object
GnomeVFSResult indicating the success of the operation

refsect2.title: gnome_vfs_socket_free ()
refsect2.para: Frees the memory allocated for socket, but does not call any GnomeVFSSocketImpl function.

listitem.simpara: The GnomeVFSSocket you want to free.

refsect2.title: gnome_vfs_socket_set_timeout ()
refsect2.para: Set a timeout of timeout. If timeout is NULL following operations will block indefinitely).

listitem.simpara: socket to set the timeout of
the timeout
optional cancellation object
GnomeVFSResult indicating the success of the operation
